inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: fluid analysis was consistent with Burkitt's lymphoma

inclusion.criterion: Age greater than or equal to 18 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Pathology confirmed by treating institution s Pathology Department
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No prior treatment except patients may be entered if they have had prior limited-field radiotherapy, a short course of glucocorticoids, cyclophosphamide for an urgent problem at diagnosis (e.g. epidural cord compression, superior vena cava syndrome) and/or a single dose of intrathecal methotrexate (MTX) at the time of the pre-treatment diagnostic lumbar puncture
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability of patient or durable power of attorney (DPA) for healthcare to give informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Inadequate renal function, defined as serum Cr > 1.5 or creatinine clearance < 50ml/min/1.73m2 unless lymphoma related
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Inadequate hepatic or hematological function: as follows, unless lymphoma-/disease-related: bilirubin greater than 2 mg/dl (total) except greater than 5 mg/dl in patients with Gilbert s syndrome as defined by greater than 80% unconjugated, ANC less than 1000 and platelets less than 75,000
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: The effects of EPOCH-R on the developing human fetus are unknown. For this reason and because chemotherapy agents are known to be teratogenic, female subject of child-bearing potential not willing to use an acceptable method of birth control(i.e., a hormonal contraceptive, intra-uterine device, diaphragm with spermicide, condom with spermicide, or abstinence) for the duration of the study and one year beyond treatment completion will not be eligible to participate in the study.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Female subject pregnant or breast-feeding. Confirmation that the subject is not pregnant must be established by a negative serum beta-human chorionic gonadotropin (beta-hCG) pregnancy test result obtained during screening. Pregnancy testing is not required for women without child-bearing potential.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: The effects of EPOCH-R on the developing human fetus are unknown. For this reason and because chemotherapy agents are known to be teratogenic, male subject unwilling to use an acceptable method for contraception for the duration of the study and one year beyond treatment completion, will not be eligible to participate in the study.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of a prior invasive malignancy in past 5 years.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Burkitt Lymphoma, is over 18 years old, and has no prior treatment except for limited-field radiotherapy. However, patient's renal function is unknown and they may be pregnant or breast-feeding.
